channel.title: Sugar on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Sugar on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Blueberry Pie Recipe
item.description: Quick Blueberry Pie Recipe is made from fresh or frozen blueberries, (preferrably from Buchan’s Blueberriesin Traverse City, Michigan out on the Old Mission Penninsula), sugar, lemon juice, and quick tapioca for thickening. Blueberry Pie is a nice dessert for any occasion. Quick Blueberry Pie Ingredients 1 pkg. pie crust (2-9″) 4 c blueberries (Buchan’s Blueberries are the best!) 3/4 c sugar 1 tsp lemon juice 3 tbsp quick tapioca 1/8 tsp salt 1 tsp vanilla ext.

item.title: Apple Smackers Recipe
item.description: Apple Smackers Recipe Serves 4 3 tart apples 3 tbsp sugar 1/2 tbsp cinnamon 2 0z. butter, melted Apple Smackers Directions Peel apples and cut in wedges. Place wedges on microwaveable plate. Brush melted butter over apples. Combine sugar with cinnamon, then sprinkle over apples. Cover with wax paper or plastic wrap and place in microwave for about 5 minutes. Check for tenderness. Eat em up.
